qa.name: Casper
qa.appearance: Translucent white figure with a round head

hf.name: Spectra
hf.appearance: Shimmering blue mist with glowing eyes

tr.name: Phantom
tr.appearance: Shadowy figure with a top hat

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the realm between worlds, old friends gather to unravel a centuries-old mystery.
json_to_edit.description: Four ghostly figures materialize in an abandoned Victorian mansion's attic.
json_to_edit.lighting: Dim, with moonlight filtering through dusty windows
json_to_edit.name: Spectral Reunion
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Four ghost friends reunite in an old mansion's attic to solve a mystery from their past.

qa.action: The attic of the abandoned mansion, filled with cobwebs and forgotten relics, as four ghostly figures materialize.

hf.action: Casper and Spectra examining an old trunk, their ghostly hands passing through the lock.

tr.action: Wisp's glowing form illuminating a faded photograph, revealing clues from the past.

xc.action: Phantom mischievously tossing old papers in the air, creating a small whirlwind of documents.

ka.action: Spectra's glowing eyes widening as she deciphers an ancient text, realizing the truth behind their mystery.

fn.action: All four ghosts gathering in the center of the attic, their forms glowing brightly as they piece together the final clues of their mystery.

edit_command: Change the location to a haunted lighthouse and make the weather stormy

updated_json.voice_over: In the realm between worlds, old friends gather to unravel a centuries-old mystery.
updated_json.description: Four ghostly figures materialize in the lantern room of a haunted lighthouse.
updated_json.lighting: Dim, with flashes of lightning illuminating the space through the glass dome
updated_json.name: Spectral Reunion
updated_json.scene_summary: Four ghost friends reunite in a haunted lighthouse to solve a mystery from their past.

qa.action: The lantern room of the haunted lighthouse, with its massive lens and railing, as four ghostly figures materialize amidst flashes of lightning.

hf.action: Casper and Spectra examining an old logbook, their ghostly hands passing through the weathered pages.

tr.action: Wisp's glowing form illuminating a faded map on the wall, revealing clues from the past.

xc.action: Phantom mischievously spinning the lighthouse lens, creating eerie light patterns across the room.

ka.action: Spectra's glowing eyes widening as she deciphers an inscription on the lighthouse wall, realizing the truth behind their mystery.

fn.sfx_keywords: triumphant ghostly chorus, magical swirling, crashing waves
fn.action: All four ghosts gathering around the lighthouse lens, their forms glowing brightly as they piece together the final clues of their mystery, while the storm rages outside.

label.rationale: we need to update the json to reflect the change in location from an abandoned victorian mansion's attic to a haunted lighthouse, and change the weather from a clear night to stormy. this change will affect several aspects of the scene, including the description, lighting, ambience, and some of the shot details. we'll make these changes while keeping the core story and characters intact.
